map.title: Live Transport Map
map.description: This map shows publicly available transport movements. For privacy reasons, no personal data is visible.

mapConsent.title: Map Service & Privacy
mapConsent.message: This map uses the external service HERE Maps. When loading the map, your IP address is transmitted to HERE. Please confirm your consent.
mapConsent.ipAddress: IP address is transmitted to HERE Global B.V.
mapConsent.location: Approximate location determination for map display
mapConsent.noStorage: No storage of personal data on our servers
mapConsent.revocable: Consent can be revoked at any time

mapFallback.title: Privacy Respected
mapFallback.message: You have not consented to the use of HERE Maps. Your privacy is important to us.

alternative.title: Alternative without external map:
alternative.search: Use our search function for transports
alternative.list: Browse current offers in list view

whatIs.title: What is HERE Maps?
whatIs.description: HERE Maps is a professional map service from HERE Global B.V. (Netherlands). We use this service to show you an interactive map with transport offers.

dataTransfer.title: What data is transmitted?
dataTransfer.ip: Your IP address (automatically with every internet access)
dataTransfer.location: Approximate location information (derived from IP address)

noData.title: What does NOT happen?
noData.personal: No transmission of names, email or account data
noData.storage: No permanent storage on our servers

legal.title: Legal basis
legal.description: The use of HERE Maps is based on your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR). You can revoke this consent at any time.

revoke.title: Revoke consent
revoke.description: You can revoke your consent to use HERE Maps at any time:
revoke.effect: After revocation, the map will no longer be loaded and you will be asked for your consent again.
